verses.verse: Then <S%H227><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> sang <S%H7891><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> song <S%H9598><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "I will sing <S%H7891><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> for He is highly <S%H1342><s%> exalted; <S%H1342><s%> The horse <S%H5483><s%> and its rider <S%H7392><s%> He has hurled <S%H9556><s%> into the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

"The Lord <S%H3050><s%> is my strength <S%H5797><s%> and song, <S%H2172><s%> And He has become <S%H1961><s%> my salvation; <S%H3444><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> is my God, <S%H410><s%> and I will praise <S%H9316><s%> Him; My father's God, <S%H430><s%> and I will extol <S%H7311><s%> Him.
"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is a warrior; <S%H4421><s%> The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is His name. <S%H8034><s%>

"Pharaoh's chariots <S%H4818><s%> and his army <S%H2428><s%> He has cast <S%H3384><s%> into the sea; <S%H3220><s%> And the choicest <S%H4005><s%> of his officers <S%H7991><s%> are drowned <S%H2883><s%> in the Red <S%H5488><s%> <S%H3220><s%> Sea. <S%H3220><s%>
"The deeps <S%H8415><s%> cover <S%H3680><s%> them; They went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> into the depths <S%H4688><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> a stone. <S%H68><s%>

"Thy right <S%H3225><s%> hand, <S%H3225><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> is majestic <S%H142><s%> in power, <S%H3581><s%> Thy right <S%H3225><s%> hand, <S%H3225><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> shatters <S%H7492><s%> the enemy. <S%H340><s%>

"And in the greatness <S%H7230><s%> of Thine excellence <S%H1347><s%> Thou dost overthrow <S%H2040><s%> those who rise <S%H6965><s%> up against Thee; Thou dost send <S%H7971><s%> forth Thy burning <S%H2740><s%> anger, <S%H2740><s%> [and] it consumes <S%H398><s%> them as chaff. <S%H7179><s%>

"And at the blast <S%H7307><s%> of Thy nostrils <S%H639><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> were piled <S%H6192><s%> up, The flowing <S%H5140><s%> waters <S%H5140><s%> stood <S%H5324><s%> up like <S%H3644><s%> a heap; <S%H5067><s%> The deeps <S%H8415><s%> were congealed <S%H7087><s%> in the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

"The enemy <S%H340><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> 'I will pursue, <S%H7291><s%> I will overtake, <S%H5381><s%> I will divide <S%H2505><s%> the spoil; <S%H7998><s%> My desire <S%H5315><s%> shall be gratified <S%H4390><s%> against them; I will draw <S%H9553><s%> out my sword, <S%H2719><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> shall destroy <S%H3423><s%> them.'

"Thou didst blow <S%H5398><s%> with Thy wind, <S%H7307><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> them; They sank <S%H6749><s%> like lead <S%H5777><s%> in the mighty <S%H117><s%> waters. <S%H4325><s%>

"Who <S%H4310><s%> is like <S%H3644><s%> Thee among the gods, <S%H410><s%> O Lord <S%H3068><s%>? Who <S%H4310><s%> is like <S%H3644><s%> Thee, majestic <S%H142><s%> in holiness, <S%H6944><s%> Awesome <S%H3372><s%> in praises, <S%H8416><s%> working <S%H6213><s%> wonders <S%H6382><s%>?
"Thou didst stretch <S%H5186><s%> out Thy right <S%H3225><s%> hand, <S%H3225><s%> The earth <S%H776><s%> swallowed <S%H1104><s%> them.

"In Thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> Thou hast led <S%H5148><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> whom <S%H2098><s%> Thou hast redeemed; <S%H1350><s%> In Thy strength <S%H5797><s%> Thou hast guided <S%H5095><s%> [them] to Thy holy <S%H6944><s%> habitation. <S%H5116><s%>
"The peoples <S%H5971><s%> have heard, <S%H8085><s%> they tremble; <S%H7264><s%> Anguish <S%H2427><s%> has gripped <S%H270><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Philistia. <S%H6429><s%>

"Then <S%H227><s%> the chiefs <S%H441><s%> of Edom <S%H9000><s%> were dismayed; <S%H926><s%> The leaders <S%H9012><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> trembling <S%H7461><s%> grips <S%H270><s%> them; All <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> have melted <S%H4127><s%> away. <S%H4127><s%>

"Terror <S%H367><s%> and dread <S%H6343><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> upon them; By the greatness <S%H1419><s%> of Thine arm <S%H2220><s%> they are motionless <S%H1826><s%> as stone; <S%H68><s%> Until <S%H5704><s%> Thy people <S%H5971><s%> pass <S%H5674><s%> over, <S%H5674><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Until <S%H5704><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> pass <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> whom <S%H2098><s%> Thou hast purchased. <S%H7069><s%>

"Thou wilt bring <S%H935><s%> them and plant <S%H5193><s%> them in the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Thine inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> The place, <S%H4349><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> which Thou hast made <S%H6466><s%> for Thy dwelling, <S%H3427><s%> The sanctuary, <S%H4720><s%> O Lord, <S%H136><s%> which Thy hands <S%H3027><s%> have established. <S%H3559><s%>
"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall reign <S%H4427><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5703><s%>"

For the horses <S%H5483><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> with his chariots <S%H7393><s%> and his horsemen <S%H6571><s%> went <S%H935><s%> into the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> on them; but the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> on dry <S%H3004><s%> land <S%H3004><s%> through the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

And Miriam <S%H4813><s%> the prophetess, <S%H5031><s%> Aaron's sister, <S%H269><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the timbrel <S%H8596><s%> in her hand, <S%H3027><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the women <S%H802><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out after <S%H310><s%> her with timbrels <S%H8596><s%> and with dancing. <S%H4246><s%>

And Miriam <S%H4813><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> them, "Sing <S%H7891><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> for He is highly <S%H1342><s%> exalted; <S%H1342><s%> The horse <S%H5483><s%> and his rider <S%H7392><s%> He has hurled <S%H9556><s%> into the sea. <S%H3220><s%>"

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> led <S%H5265><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> from the Red <S%H5488><s%> <S%H3220><s%> Sea, <S%H3220><s%> and they went <S%H3318><s%> out into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Shur; <S%H7793><s%> and they went <S%H1980><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> and found <S%H4672><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> water. <S%H4325><s%>

And when they came <S%H935><s%> to Marah, <S%H4785><s%> they could <S%H3201><s%> not drink <S%H8354><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Marah, <S%H4785><s%> for they were bitter; <S%H4751><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> it was named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> Marah. <S%H4785><s%>
So the people <S%H5971><s%> grumbled <S%H9235><s%> at Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> shall we drink <S%H8354><s%>?"

Then he cried <S%H6817><s%> out to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> showed <S%H3384><s%> him a tree; <S%H6086><s%> and he threw <S%H7993><s%> [it] into the waters, <S%H4325><s%> and the waters <S%H4325><s%> became <S%H4985><s%> sweet. <S%H4985><s%> There <S%H8033><s%> He made <S%H7760><s%> for them a statute <S%H2706><s%> and regulation, <S%H4941><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> He tested <S%H5254><s%> them.

And He said, <S%H559><s%> "If <S%H518><s%> you will give <S%H8085><s%> earnest <S%H8085><s%> heed <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> what is right <S%H3477><s%> in His sight, <S%H5869><s%> and give <S%H238><s%> ear <S%H238><s%> to His commandments, <S%H4687><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> His statutes, <S%H2706><s%> I will put <S%H7760><s%> none <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3808><s%> of the diseases <S%H9258><s%> on you which <S%H834><s%> I have put <S%H7760><s%> on the Egyptians; <S%H4714><s%> for I, the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> am your healer. <S%H7495><s%>"

Then they came <S%H935><s%> to Elim <S%H362><s%> where <S%H8033><s%> there [were] twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> springs <S%H9407><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> and seventy <S%H7657><s%> date <S%H8558><s%> palms, <S%H8558><s%> and they camped <S%H2583><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> beside <S%H5921><s%> the waters. <S%H4325><s%>
